title: [HOLD for payment 2023-05-16] [$4000] Web - Inputs are "Flickering" in VBA flow when clicked on
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Access staging.new.expensify.com
2. Sign into a valid account
3. Click on Profile > Workspace > Connect to bank
4. Proceed with flow until you reach the "Date" section
5. Click on the date input fields

Expected result: User expects the button to be clicked on with no flickering

Actual result: None
